message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this amazing product with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering its exceptional quality and unique features.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe it's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a serious offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $700000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious commitment to purchase the product. After re-evaluating the market and the product's value, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $675000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's unique features and my own financial goals.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to offer $660000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
